data.eml:eml: A new species of Asphinctopone (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae) from Tanzania.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hawkes, P. G. (2010): A new species of Asphinctopone (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Ponerinae) from Tanzania. Zootaxa 2480: 27-36, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/23051/23051.pdf
